profileAlternative.name: Jennifer Tyrseck
profileAlternative.headline: Communications Director at MongoDB (Nasdaq: MDB)
profileAlternative.summary: Experienced in high-tech and high-science public relations, industry analyst relations, and marketing communications. Proven success driving strategic communications programs and people management.

aboutAlternative.text: Experienced in high-tech and high-science public relations, industry analyst relations, and marketing communications. Proven success driving strategic communications programs and people management.

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description: MongoDB is the leading modern, general purpose database platform, designed to unleash the power of software and data for developers and the applications they build. Headquartered in New York, MongoDB has more than 14,200 customers in over 100 countries. The MongoDB database platform has been downloaded over 65 million times and there have been more than one million MongoDB University registrations.

positions.title:
Title
Director, Corporate Communications
positions.description: MongoDB is the leading modern, general purpose database platform, designed to unleash the power of software and data for developers and the applications they build. Headquartered in New York, MongoDB has more than 14,200 customers in over 100 countries. The MongoDB database platform has been downloaded over 65 million times and there have been more than one million MongoDB University registrations.

positions.title: Ogilvy Public Relations
positions.description:
Served as day-to-day client contact for several pharmaceutical companies' franchises, products and unbranded disease awareness campaigns. Healthcare knowledge spanned across several therapeutic categories, including oncology, rheumatology, inflammation, mental health, orphan illnesses and women's health. Received Ogilvy PR’s highest internal recognition for social media implementation and counseling (“Red Belt”). Selected to participate in WPP mini-MBA program.

positions.title:
Title
Events Coordinator/Talent Booker/Group President
positions.description:
Oversaw planning and execution of concerts, lectures and comedy events. Worked directly with talent agents and high profile entertainers. Acted as spokesperson to external organizations and media outlets. Created and developed professional speaker series for group members. Led group meetings and managed budget. Largest student organization on the University of Delaware's campus.

educations.title: University of Delaware

given.text:
If you're fortunate enough to work with Jennifer you will experience a truly one of a kind professional. She marries the best attributes of a leader, a manager and an individual contributor and approaches each project or task thoughtfully, viewing the potential solutions from every angle. Jennifer is passionate about her job and an incredible role model to the team.
…
See more

Jennifer served as a trusted mentor and advisor to me during my time as an exchange student with Rotary International Youth Exchange. Throughout our numerous interactions both in the United States and in Germany, Jennifer displayed outstanding communication and interpersonal skills, regardless of the language at hand. Jennifer exemplified the independence, creativity, resourcefulness, and cultural awareness and sensitivity that are critical to a successful Rotary Youth Exchange experience, thus making her a valued role model for me as well as for the numerous exchange students she has mentored and advised in the past.
…
See more

We hired Jennifer to be our summer intern before her senior year at the Univeristy of Delaware. She was one of the most mature college interns we've ever had, worked very hard, had a keen sense of responsibility and absorbed everything she could during her time with us. She already had good skills, even at that stage, and she was very enthusiastic to put them to work. Jennifer was also a pleasure to have working with us! I have no doubt that she'll go far in her career and I'll be proud to say, "I knew her when..."
…
See more
